verses.english: I do swear by this city ˹of Mecca˺—
even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are subject to abuse in this city—
and by every parent and ˹their˺ child!
Indeed, We have created humankind in ˹constant˺ struggle.

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.english: Do they think that no one has power over them,
boasting, “I have wasted enormous wealth!”?
Do they think that no one sees them?
Have We not given them two eyes,
a tongue, and two lips;
and shown them the two ways ˹of right and wrong˺?
If only they had attempted the challenging path ˹of goodness instead˺!
And what will make you realize what ˹attempting˺ the challenging path is?
It is to free a slave,

verses.arabic: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.english: or to give food in times of famine
to an orphaned relative
or to a poor person in distress,

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.english: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion.
These are the people of the right.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
verses.english: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left.<sup foot_note=77622>1</sup>
The Fire will be sealed over them.
